repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a manuscript of Taittirīya Saṃhitā of Yajurveda. It contains padapāṭha of the 4th chapter of the Taittirīya Saṃhitā. Colophon at the end is wirren in Tamil language. Something written in the front guard folio but not illegible.

msItem.title: Taittirīya Saṃhitā Padapāṭha (4th chapter)

filiation.p: VOHD II.4.p-36, entry no. 1123, NCC vol 21 pp: 221-224

msItem.incipit: 1v1 yuṃjānaḥ . prathamaṃ manaḥ tatvāya savitā dhīyaḥ . agniṃ jyotiḥ . nicāyya pṛthivyāḥ adhi eti abharat . yuktvāya manasā devān suvaḥ . yataḥ . dhiyā divaṃ bṛhat jyotiḥ kariṣya[taḥ] 1v 2 savitā . preti suvāti tān yuktena manasāvayaṃ devasya savituḥ save suvaḥ iti geyāya saktyai yuṃjate manaḥ uta yuṃjate dhiyaḥ viprāḥ viprasya bṛahataḥ vipaścitaḥ vīti [gap of 2 syllables due to broken folio.]
msItem.explicit: 36v 2 nāthītaḥ . Jauhavi te no muñcata enasaḥ yat te vayaṃ puruṣatrā yaviṣṭha avidvāṃsaḥ cakruma kat cana āgaḥ kṛdhi sviti asmān aditeḥ . anāgāḥ viti enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ . viśvak agne 36v 3 yatā ha tat vasavaḥ gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitāṃ amuñcata yajatrā evā tvaṃ asmat preti muñca vīti ahaṃ preti atāri agne pratarā naḥ āyuḥ agnāviṣṇu prātarān naḥ āyuḥ
msItem.colophon: 36v 4 dhātuṇāma saṃvatsara māsimāsaṃ 8 ṇāyatti kiḷamai cāhittaha maṇi 3 oku eḷuṭi mukiñcittu

support.p: Thick palm leaf as guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin on the verso of folio.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

origin.origDate: As per the colophon this amnuscript was completed on 3.2.1577. This date is given according to colophon by V, Raghavan.

listBibl.bibl: Taittirīya Saṃhitā with the Padapāṭha and the commentaries of Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara Miśra and Sāyaṇācārya by N. S. Sontakke, Trivikrama Nārāyaṇa Dharmādhikārī Vaidika Saṃśodhana Maṇḍala [u.a.], Poona 1970-2010

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. The last word on line 1 on 1v, kariṣya[taḥ] , square bracket is showing the supplied syllable.
